sources.title: When a Man's a Man
sources.description: Title: When a Man's a Man Summary: A landslide has diverted water from the Baldwin ranch to Cambert's. With their cattle dying, Cambert refuses to let them have any water. Easterner Larry Knight takes a job with the Baldwins... Directed by: Edward F. Cline Actors: Production Company: Sol Lesser Productions Release Date: 15 February 1935 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A landslide has diverted water from the Baldwin ranch to Cambert's. With their cattle dying, Cambert refuses to let them have any water. Easterner Larry Knight takes a job with the Baldwins and he has a plan to divert the water back to the Baldwin ranch. But Phil, jealous of Kitty's attraction to Larry, lets Cambert know of the scheme.

sources.title: When a Man's a Man
sources.description: The story is about a man named Larry (George O'Brien) who is a drifter. He is traveling by train and at a stop goes to a Rodeo. He sees these guys riding a wild horse and he wants to see if he can do it. Well he falls off and to top it all off, misses his train. So he decides to stay behind and work on ranch.

sources.title: When a Man's a Man (1935) GEORGE O'BRIEN
sources.description:
Stars: George O'Brien, Dorothy Wilson, Paul Kelly 
 Director: Edward F. Cline

 A landslide has diverted water from the Baldwin ranch to Cambert's. With their cattle dying, Cambert refuses to let them have any water. Easterner Larry Knight takes a job with the Baldwins and he has a plan to divert the water back to the Baldwin ranch. But Phil, jealous of Kitty's attraction to Larry, lets Cambert know of the scheme.

sources.title: When a Man's a Man (1935) Western Full Length Movie
sources.description:
He Was A Man's Man... but a woman owned his heart! 
A man who has spent all his inheritance, finds meaning in life, and love, at ranch where his ingenuity is put to good use.

Director: Edward F. Cline
Writers: Frank Mitchell Dazey, Agnes Christine Johnston 
Stars: George O'Brien, Dorothy Wilson, Paul Kelly 
Genres: Classics, Western, Romance

But Phil, jealous of Kitty's attraction to Larry, lets Cambert know of the scheme.
